lib/hope/serialization/struct_serialization.h

00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/tuple/tuple_from_struct.h"
00012 #include "hope/tuple/compute_field_count_recursive.h"
00013 #include "hope/serialization/package.h"
00014 #include "hope/serialization/custom_serializer_holder.h"
00015 
00016 #include <unordered_map>
00017 #include <bitset>
00018 #include <any>
00019 #include <typeindex>
00020 
00021 namespace hope::serialization {
00022 
00023     template <typename T, typename... CustomSerializer>
00024     class pod_serializer final {
00025         constexpr static std::size_t fields_count{ compute_field_count_recursive_constexpr<T>() };
00026         using bit_mask = std::bitset <fields_count>;
00027         using serializer_holder_t = custom_serializer_holder<CustomSerializer...>;
00028         using serializer_map = std::unordered_map<std::type_index, std::any>;
00029     public:
00030         pod_serializer(T& serializable_struct, double _fp_accuracy = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon())
00031             : m_value(serializable_struct)
00032             , m_fp_accuracy(_fp_accuracy) {}
00033 
00034         void serialize(package& pack) {
00035             const auto mask_begin_pos = pack.reserve(get_bit_mask_actual_size());
00036             std::size_t index{ 0 };
00037             serialize(m_value, m_prev_value, pack, index);
00038             const auto struct_end_pos = pack.seek(mask_begin_pos);
00039             write_mask( pack);
00040             pack.seek(struct_end_pos);
00041             m_first_pack = false;
00042             m_prev_value = m_value;
00043         }
00044 
00045         void deserialize(package& pack) {
00046             read_mask(pack);
00047             std::size_t index{ 0 };
00048             deserialize(m_value, pack, index);
00049         }
00050 
00051     private:
00052         template<typename TValue>
00053         void serialize(const TValue& value, const TValue& prev_value, package& pack, std::size_t& cur_index) {
00054             if constexpr (serializer_holder_t::template has<TValue>())
00055                 serialize_custom_type(value, prev_value, pack, cur_index);
00056             else 
00057                 serialize_impl(value, prev_value, pack, cur_index);
00058         }
00059 
00060         template <typename TValue>
00061         void serialize_custom_type(const TValue& value, const TValue& prev_value, package& pack, std::size_t& cur_index) {
00062             using serializer_t = typename decltype(serializer_holder_t::template serializer<TValue>())::Type;
00063             auto&& serializer_any = extract<TValue, serializer_t>(m_serializer_map);
00064             auto&& serializer = std::any_cast<serializer_t>(serializer_any);
00065             m_mask[cur_index] = serializer(value, prev_value, pack);
00066             ++cur_index;
00067         }
00068 
00069         template<typename TValue>
00070         std::enable_if_t<std::is_class_v<TValue>>
00071         serialize_impl(const TValue& value, const TValue& prev_value, package& pack, std::size_t& cur_index) {
00072             auto&& tuple = tuple_from_struct(value, field_policy::reference{});
00073             auto&& prev_tuple = tuple_from_struct(prev_value, field_policy::reference{});
00074 
00075             for_each(tuple, prev_tuple, [&](auto&& field, auto&& prev_field) {
00076                 serialize(field, prev_field, pack, cur_index);
00077             });
00078         }
00079 
00080         template<typename TValue>
00081         std::enable_if_t<!std::is_class_v<TValue>>
00082         serialize_impl(const TValue& value, const TValue& prev_value, package& pack, std::size_t& cur_index) {
00083             const bool changed = m_first_pack || !is_equal(value, prev_value);
00084             if (changed)
00085                 pack.write(value);
00086             m_mask[cur_index] = changed;
00087             ++cur_index;
00088         }
00089 
00090         template<typename TValue>
00091         void deserialize(TValue& value, package& pack, std::size_t& cur_index) {
00092             if constexpr (serializer_holder_t::template has<TValue>())
00093                 deserialize_custom_type(value, pack, cur_index);
00094             else
00095                 deserialize_impl(value, pack, cur_index);
00096         }
00097 
00098         template <typename TValue>
00099         void deserialize_custom_type(TValue& value, package& pack, std::size_t& cur_index) {
00100             if (m_mask[cur_index]) {
00101                 using deserializer_t = typename decltype(serializer_holder_t::template deserializer<TValue>())::Type;
00102                 auto&& deserializer_any = extract<TValue, deserializer_t>(m_deserializer_map);
00103                 auto&& deserializer = std::any_cast<deserializer_t>(deserializer_any);
00104                 deserializer(value, pack);
00105             }
00106             ++cur_index;
00107         }
00108 
00109         template<typename TValue>
00110         std::enable_if_t<std::is_class_v<TValue>>
00111         deserialize_impl(TValue& value, package& pack, std::size_t& cur_index) {
00112             auto&& tuple = tuple_from_struct(value, field_policy::reference{});
00113 
00114             for_each(tuple, [&](auto&& field) {
00115                 deserialize(field, pack, cur_index);
00116             });
00117         }
00118 
00119         template<typename TValue>
00120         std::enable_if_t<!std::is_class_v<TValue>>
00121         deserialize_impl(TValue& value, package& pack, std::size_t& cur_index) {
00122             if (m_mask[cur_index])
00123                 value = pack.read<TValue>();
00124             ++cur_index;
00125         }
00126 
00127         template <typename V>
00128         [[nodiscard]] bool is_equal(const V& left, const V& right) const {
00129             if constexpr (std::is_floating_point_v<V>)
00130                 return std::abs(left - right) < m_fp_accuracy;
00131             return left == right;
00132         }
00133 
00134         void write_mask(package& pack) {
00135             if constexpr (fields_count <= std::numeric_limits<unsigned long>::digits)
00136                 pack.write(m_mask.to_ulong());
00137             else
00138                 pack.write(m_mask.to_ullong());
00139         }
00140 
00141         template<typename MaskType>
00142         void read_mask_impl(package& pack) {
00143             auto&& mask = pack.read<MaskType>();
00144             m_mask = bit_mask(mask);
00145         }
00146 
00147         void read_mask(package& pack) {
00148             if constexpr (fields_count <= std::numeric_limits<unsigned long>::digits)
00149                 read_mask_impl<unsigned long>(pack);
00150             else
00151                 read_mask_impl<unsigned long long>(pack);
00152         }
00153 
00154         [[nodiscard]] static constexpr auto get_bit_mask_actual_size() {
00155             if constexpr (fields_count <= std::numeric_limits<unsigned long>::digits)
00156                 return sizeof (unsigned long);
00157             return sizeof(unsigned long long);
00158         }
00159 
00160         template<typename TValue, typename TSerializer>
00161         [[nodiscard]] std::any& extract(serializer_map& map) const {
00162             auto&& type_index = std::type_index(typeid(TValue));
00163             auto&& it = map.find(type_index);
00164             if (it == std::end(map))
00165                 it = map.emplace(type_index, TSerializer{}).first;
00166             return it->second;
00167         }
00168 
00169         T& m_value;
00170         T m_prev_value;
00171         bool m_first_pack{ true };
00172         bit_mask m_mask;
00173         serializer_map m_serializer_map;
00174         serializer_map m_deserializer_map;
00175         const double m_fp_accuracy;
00176 
00177         static_assert(fields_count <= std::numeric_limits<unsigned long long>::digits, "Men, you can't use this serializer for structure with 65 fields and more.");
00178     };
00179 
00180 }
00181 
00182 #define DECLARE_SERIALIZER(ClassName) \
00183     struct ClassName##_serializer final{ \
00184         bool operator()(const ClassName& value, const ClassName& prev_value, hope::serialization::package& pack) const; \
00185 }; \
00186 bool ClassName##_serializer::operator()(const ClassName& value, const ClassName& prev_value, hope::serialization::package& pack) const\
00187 
00188 #define DECLARE_DESERIALIZER(ClassName) \
00189     struct ClassName##_deserializer final{ \
00190         void operator()(ClassName& value, hope::serialization::package& pack) const; \
00191 }; \
00192 void ClassName##_deserializer::operator()(ClassName& value, hope::serialization::package& pack) const\
